title: Buttery soft pretzels
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons dried active yeast', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '300ml warm water (45 C)', '625g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '100g bicarbonate of soda (for dipping solution)', '1L hot water (for dipping solution)', '2 tablespoons coarse sea salt, for topping']
